verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> false prophets <S%G5578><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> arose <S%G1096><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people, <S%G2992><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> false teachers <S%G5572><s%> will also <S%G2532><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> will secretly bring in <S%G3919><s%> destructive <S%G684><s%> heresies, <S%G139><s%> denying <S%G720><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the Master <S%G1203><s%> who bought <S%G59><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> bringing on <S%G1863><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> swift <S%G5031><s%> destruction. <S%G684><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> will follow <S%G1811><s%> their <S%G846><s%> immoral ways, <S%G684><s%> and as a result, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%> will be maligned. <S%G987><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> covetousness <S%G4124><s%> they <S%G1710><s%> will exploit <S%G1710><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with deceptive words: <S%G3056><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> sentence <S%G2917><s%> now <S%G691><s%> from of <S%G1710><s%> old <S%G1597><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> linger, <S%G691><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> destruction <S%G684><s%> will not <S%G3756><s%> slumber. <S%G3573><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> spare <S%G5339><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> when they sinned, <S%G264><s%> but <S%G235><s%> cast <S%G5020><s%> them down to Tartarus, <S%G5020><s%> and committed <S%G3860><s%> them to pits <S%G4577><s%> of darkness, <S%G2217><s%> to be reserved <S%G5083><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> judgment; <S%G2920><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> spare <S%G5339><s%> the <S%G2889><s%> ancient <S%G744><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> but <S%G235><s%> preserved <S%G5442><s%> Noah <S%G3575><s%> with seven others, <S%G3590><s%> a preacher <S%G2783><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> when he brought <S%G1863><s%> a flood <S%G2627><s%> on the world <S%G2889><s%> of the ungodly; <S%G765><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> turning <S%G5077><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> of Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Gomorrah <S%G1116><s%> into ashes, <S%G5077><s%> condemned <S%G2632><s%> them to destruction, <S%G2692><s%> having made <S%G5087><s%> them an example <S%G5262><s%> to those who would <S%G3195><s%> live ungodly; <S%G764><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> delivered <S%G4506><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> Lot, <S%G3091><s%> who was very distressed <S%G2669><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the lustful <S%G766><s%> life <S%G391><s%> of the wicked <S%G113><s%>

(for <S%G1063><s%> that righteous man <S%G1342><s%> dwelling <S%G1460><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> was tormented <S%G928><s%> in his righteous <S%G1342><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> to <S%G1537><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> with <S%G2041><s%> seeing <S%G990><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hearing <S%G189><s%> lawless <S%G459><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%>):

the Lord <S%G2962><s%> knows how <S%G1492><s%> to deliver <S%G4506><s%> the godly <S%G2152><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> temptation <S%G3986><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> to keep <S%G5083><s%> the unrighteous <S%G94><s%> under punishment <S%G2849><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment; <S%G2920><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> chiefly <S%G3122><s%> those who walk <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the lust <S%G1939><s%> of defilement, <S%G3394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> despise <S%G2706><s%> authority. <S%G2963><s%> Daring, <S%G5113><s%> self-willed, <S%G829><s%> they are <S%G5141><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> afraid <S%G5141><s%> to speak evil <S%G987><s%> of dignitaries; <S%G1391><s%>

whereas <S%G3699><s%> angels, <S%G32><s%> though <S%G5607><s%> greater <S%G3173><s%> in might <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> power, <S%G2479><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> bring <S%G5342><s%> a railing <S%G989><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> them <S%G846><s%> before <S%G3844><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> these, <S%G3778><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> unreasoning <S%G249><s%> creatures, <S%G1080><s%> born natural <S%G5446><s%> animals <S%G2226><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> be taken <S%G259><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> destroyed, <S%G5356><s%> speaking evil <S%G987><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> matters about which <S%G3739><s%> they are ignorant, <S%G50><s%> will in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> destroying <S%G5356><s%> surely be destroyed, <S%G2704><s%>

receiving <S%G2865><s%> the wages <S%G3408><s%> of unrighteousness; <S%G93><s%> people who count <S%G2233><s%> it pleasure <S%G2237><s%> to revel <S%G5172><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the daytime, <S%G2250><s%> spots <S%G4696><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blemishes, <S%G3470><s%> reveling <S%G1792><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> deceit <S%G539><s%> while they feast <S%G4910><s%> with you; <S%G5213><s%>

having <S%G2192><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of adultery, <S%G3428><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who can't <S%G180><s%> cease from sin; <S%G266><s%> enticing <S%G1185><s%> unsettled <S%G793><s%> souls; <S%G2192><s%> having a heart <S%G2588><s%> trained <S%G1128><s%> in greed; <S%G4124><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> of cursing; <S%G2671><s%>

forsaking <S%G2641><s%> the right <S%G2117><s%> way, <S%G3598><s%> they went astray, <S%G4105><s%> having followed <S%G1811><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of Balaam <S%G903><s%> the son of Beor, <S%G1007><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the wages <S%G3408><s%> of wrongdoing; <S%G93><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> he was <S%G2192><s%> rebuked <S%G1649><s%> for <S%G3892><s%> his <S%G2398><s%> own disobedience. <S%G3892><s%> A mute <S%G880><s%> donkey <S%G5268><s%> spoke <S%G5350><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a man <S%G444><s%>'s voice <S%G5456><s%> and stopped <S%G2967><s%> the madness <S%G3913><s%> of the prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> wells <S%G4077><s%> without water, <S%G504><s%> clouds <S%G3507><s%> driven <S%G1643><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> a storm; <S%G2978><s%> for whom <S%G3739><s%> the blackness <S%G2217><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%> has been reserved <S%G5083><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%>

For, <S%G1063><s%> uttering <S%G5350><s%> great swelling <S%G5246><s%> words of emptiness, <S%G3153><s%> they entice <S%G1185><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> by licentiousness, <S%G766><s%> those who are indeed <S%G3689><s%> escaping <S%G668><s%> from those who live <S%G390><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> error; <S%G4106><s%>

promising <S%G1861><s%> them <S%G846><s%> liberty, <S%G1657><s%> while they themselves <S%G846><s%> are <S%G5225><s%> bondservants <S%G1401><s%> of corruption; <S%G5356><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> is brought into bondage <S%G1402><s%> by <S%G5129><s%> whoever <S%G3739><s%> overcomes him. <S%G2274><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if, <S%G1487><s%> after they have escaped <S%G668><s%> the defilement <S%G3393><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Savior <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G1161><s%> they are <S%G1707><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> entangled <S%G1707><s%> in <S%G5125><s%> it and overcome, <S%G2274><s%> the last state <S%G2078><s%> has become <S%G1096><s%> worse <S%G5501><s%> for them <S%G846><s%> than the first. <S%G4413><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it would be better <S%G2909><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to have known <S%G1921><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> than, <S%G2228><s%> after knowing <S%G1921><s%> it, <S%G1994><s%> to turn back from <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G1785><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> to them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> it has happened <S%G4819><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> according to the <S%G3942><s%> true <S%G227><s%> proverb, <S%G3942><s%> "The dog <S%G2965><s%> turns <S%G1994><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> vomit <S%G1829><s%> again, <S%G1994><s%>" and <S%G2532><s%> "the sow <S%G5300><s%> that has washed <S%G3068><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> wallowing <S%G2946><s%> in the mire. <S%G1004><s%>"
